Description:
Downsize Into The Dream!
Exceptional opportunity in one of Grovedale's most convenient locations, this immaculately presented 2 BR unit is the perfect option for downsizers. Offering a quiet and private lifestyle with backyard space to either attend to the garden or utilize the side access for caravans or boats. The open plan design will impress with an inviting living room and light filled kitchen with quality appliances and plenty of bench/cupboard space. The two generous bedrooms both feature large built in robes & carpeted floors. The central bathroom offers shower, bath & vanity along with a separate toilet. Outside is very private & low maintenance with plenty of room to entertain. Additional features such as gas wall heater, split system and secure lock up garage this stunning unit is a must see!
Within walking distance to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools and sporting fields, and only a few moments' drive to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Marshall train station and Geelong ring road. Get in quick opportunities like this don't last!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 1/163 Heyers Road, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 11 other 2 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Great first Home or Investment
This beautifully presented 3-bedroom 2 bathroom brick veneer home is perfect for young families or astute investors. Immaculately presented the home comprises of 3 bedrooms, master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite. Bedrooms 2 & 3 both with built in robes, plenty of cupboard space throughout. Main bathroom has separate shower and corner spa. Great kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven and cooktop which then leads out to the open plan family and dining area. Upon entry you are welcomed by a formal living room. Coonara wood heater, along with a gas wall heater and 2 new electrical panel heaters in both living areas plus split system cooling in the front living space. The laundry has plenty of storage and has a separate access down the side of the house. All securely fenced in for a safe environment for your pets and children, along with a great cubbyhouse and paved entertaining area where you can sit back have a BBQ and a few drinks whilst entertaining friends or family and still see your kids enjoying the sunshine. The property also has a water tank and a single lock-up garage. An inspection is a must!!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: First listed on 21 September, this house has been on Domain for 29 days (last updated on 21 September). It was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
The ideal family entertainer.
Presenting one of the finest pieces of real estate Corio has on offer! This family residence offers a rare opportunity for you to have your own, well built, super-sized home that's bound to charm the fussiest of buyers. Meticulously maintained and featuring four good sized bedrooms, two bathrooms, two spacious living zones, all sitting on a delightful 592m2 block (approx.). Homes like this simply don't come on the market often, take advantage of this rare opportunity today!
The home comprises of a master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, a sun-filled lounge room which features modern open plan living with a family area and kitchen. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, built in pantry, two ovens and much more. Flowing out from the living area is the magnificent outdoor alfresco, which makes for excellent entertaining with family and friends all year long, whatever the weather may be. A double remote controlled garage and ample off street parking are added bonuses along with split system cooling, ducted heating and cooling, built in robes in bedrooms and study.
Located within close proximity to local schools, the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and the Princes Highway for commuters. Don't wait book your inspection today!
Insights: 17 Nigella Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
The perfect corner allotment.
Bursting with potential and located in a sought after pocket of Corio, sits this well maintained corner block property on 605m2 (approx.). Immaculately presented by its current owners and currently waiting for a lucky first home buyer, growing family or investor to recreate or design the home however they like. All major amenities are within easy reach such as public transport, local schools, sporting facilities and much more. The home offers four good size bedrooms, kitchen and meals, separate laundry and an additional dining/lounge area which could also be converted into a study. The grassed backyard provides ample space for the kids to play or for you to grow a veggie patch (if you have a green thumb). Additional features of the home include split system air-conditioning, gas heating, ceiling fans, built in robes, a single car port and double lock up garage. Call us today to book your private inspection.

Description:
Updated Family Home in Central Location
This beautifully presented 4 bedroom brick family home on a 680 sqm block (approx.) is an ideal first home or investment property. Located close to local Primary & Secondary schools, Corio shopping & Medical centres as well as bus stops & train station.
The bright lounge room with gas heater & air conditioner leads to the dining area & updated modern kitchen. The family chef will find an electric under bench oven, gas hotplates, plenty of bench space, good storage from the ample drawers & cupboards as well as pantry. All 4 bedrooms have built in robes & are serviced by the fresh & functional family bathroom.
Stepping outside you will discover a generous & secure backyard which gives plenty of space for the kids & pets plus scope for you to add an entertainment area (stca). The oversized garage allows for a workshop area & good storage as well as a single carport all sitting behind high double gates.
Currently leased at $360/week & with a strong rental history this lovely home presents outstanding value & should definitely be on your shopping list. Call to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 29 Talona Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2014 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Home With Large Backyard
Perfectly suited to first-home buyers, investors or a young family, this home is move in ready. Those in need of room to move will love the large backyard and 664sqm block while an updated kitchen, outdoor entertaining and a central location is guaranteed to wow a range of buyers. Floorboards flow throughout the three bedrooms and light-filled lounge while the bedrooms also boast ceiling fans and built-in robes. The lounge is complete with gas heating, split system air-conditioning and a ceiling fan plus there's an open-plan kitchen and meals area, ideal for family dinners. The home chef will love the gas cooktop and ample storage space while a paved front patio and a paved rear entertaining area are perfect for hosting guests. The bathroom features a separate bath and shower along with an updated vanity for added comfort. A double detached garage with space for a workshop and a second crossover with parking for a caravan or boat completes the property. You will live only a short walk from schools, Corio village, medical centres and public transport and easy access to the Geelong Ring Road.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
This is an investors dream!
Vacant ready to move into now. This solid brick residence is immaculately presented having undergone cosmetic improvements in recent times including new carpet and paintwork. This well maintained home is bursting with potential and located in a sought after pocket of Corio, The property is situated on 664m2 (approx.). Includes
• Traditional Floor Plan with 3 Large Bedrooms
• North Facing Backyard
• Central Lounge Room with Gas heating
• Light and Bright Kitchen Zone with Eat in Dining Zone
• Central Heating, Ceiling fans to bedrooms
• Separate Bathroom and Laundry
• Traditional Single car port and Garden shed.
• Conventional Allotment of 664m² (approx.) will provide Redevelopment Options (STCA)
• Solid Rent Return of Approx. $340/week are achievable in this area
Located between Princes Highway, Princes Freeway and Bacchus Marsh Road and situated in one of Geelong's top performing capital growth corridors makes this an ideal investment for those searching for stability or an ideal first home. Providing all major amenities within easy reach such as shopping centre, public transport, local schools, sporting facilities and much more. Register your interest today to avoid disappointment.

Description:
Ideal Family Home
Perfect for families, this is a property for a wide range of buyers from first-timers to renovators or investors. You can move in as-is and enjoy the space on offer or update and add value to the home; the choice is yours. Inside, the layout offers four bedrooms, three with built-in robes and split system air-conditioning including the oversized master. The galley style kitchen and meals area is set in the heart of the home with access to the paved outdoor area. Accommodating families there is space for all with a separate family room with a built-in bar and wood-burning fireplace and lounge room with gas heating and split system air-conditioning. Outside there is plenty of yard space and off street parking behind secure gates while the 26-panel solar system increases the home's green credentials. Located just minutes from local schools, Aldi, Corio Village shopping centre, parks and transport links, while easy access to the Corio Train Station and the Geelong Ring Road will make for a quick commute to and from work.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Updated Family Home
Nestled in a quiet pocket just minutes to local schools, shops and transport links, this renovated three bedroom home boasts spacious living and an open plan design. Showcasing three bedrooms all with built in robes, master with a walk-in robe and renovated ensuite, the home will make an ideal investment, first home or upgrade for a family. The main living space features a fireplace and vaulted ceiling creating spacious light filled area to relax and unwind. The updated kitchen offers a huge amount of bench and storage storage, dishwasher, 900mm stove and oven and breakfast bar. Connecting the kitchen and living space is the dining area that opens out to the undercover patio and tidy backyard. Bedrooms two and three and modern family bathroom are set to the rear of the home. Additional features include, gas heating, ceiling fans, a larger walk-in linen cupboard and updated flooring. Corio Village shopping centre Bell Post Shopping Centre, are within walking distance and the Ring Road are all easily accessible. Register your interest today!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A Great Investment or First Home in an Ideal Location
Set on 557m2 (approx) this home offers exceptional value for investors looking for a lucrative rental yield or first home buyers wanting to break into the ever-popular Geelong market.
Set in a private pocket and close to public transport, primary & secondary schools, local shops and the Geelong Ring Road this property is never too far from amenities.
Featuring three good sized bedrooms, polished floorboards throughout, central kitchen and meals zone and a large lounge with reverse cycle split system and wall heater for all-year-round comfort.
Undercover parking is taken care of with the double tandem carport and there is plenty of room to build a shed at the rear of the home to add to this already neat package.
- Three bedrooms
- Large living zone
- Undercover off-street parking
- Reverse cycle heating and cooling
- Close to local schools, shops, Geelong Ring Road & Public Transport
*Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Stylish family living.
Introducing this well maintained property on a 780m2 (approx.) block which has plenty of room for the whole family to enjoy, in a quiet court location with close proximity to all major amenities. The home provides a large lounge with polished floorboards and gas heating with access to the practical kitchen adjacent the laundry. Comprising of three comfortable sized bedrooms (two with BIR's) which are located nearby the central bathroom while outside a convenient workshop provides an additional W/C perfect for an added rumpus room or storage space if desired. Secure parking is ensured in the large garage to the side of the property which has had a portion of the space converted into an enclosed studio or potential 4th bedroom. Ample space still remains in the large driveway for storing boats, caravans or trailers if required. Within close proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools for all ages & sporting facilities nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!

Description:
A family favourite.
Light, bright and generously proportioned on a sizeable yet easy-to-maintain 608sqm (approx.) block. This exciting, newly renovated three-bedroom home is neatly presented and perfect for first home buyers and investors.
Freshly painted inside and out, rewired and with a recently renovated kitchen with new appliances. Newly polished timber floorboards, freshly updated carpet, split system air-conditioning and heating, with a newly modernised spacious bathroom.
The generous off-street parking in secure surrounds offers peace of mind. This spectacular home delights with its open plan living/dining areas, new blinds (block and sheer) and new down lights add further appeal.
What's also guaranteed to excite is the convenient access to Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, family restaurants, cafes, local schools, parks, reserves and only a short distance to the Princes Highway.

This lovely family home represents an exciting opportunity for first home buyers, the growing family and investors alike. Featuring four large bedrooms (three with BIRs), a generous size living area and spacious kitchen with separate family/dining area. Set on a generous allotment of approx. 669m2, it includes a spacious rear yard with potential for an in ground pool. Within close proximity to local schools, public transport, Corio Shopping Centre and Princes Highway for commuters, this home is perfect and offers fantastic value for money. A property this good doesn't last long, so call to inspect today!
Insights: 24 Rimula Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A Perfect First Home Or Investment With Plenty Of Storage
Situated on an ample 613m2 block (approx) you'll find this excellent updated three-bedroom home in a great location that is sure to impress first home buyers and investors alike.
Featuring three bedrooms all with built-in robes, a light-filled front lounge with split system A/C and a step down second living area that makes for plenty of space for the family to enjoy. Plus a tastefully updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gas cooking that makes for a very welcoming and family-friendly central zone.
The exterior of the property is fully equipped with a large colorbond double garage/shed for secure storage as well as a large carport, secure gated side access and an undercover alfresco with storage and power that is perfect for entertaining.
Extra features include ducted gas heating throughout, split system cooling, an updated central bathroom, and roller shutters fitted to all bedrooms and front lounge. With plenty of extras and a great location, this home should definitely be on your inspection list!
Key Features
- 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes
- Set on a large 613m2 block (approx)
- Tastefully updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances & gas cooking
- Solar power
- Gas ducted heating throughout
- Rear undercover alfresco area with power
- Colorbond double garage
- Ample low maintenance yards
*Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
"Ideal Investment Opportunity or Great Family Home
Sitting on approximately 621m2 corner block is this fantastic brick home providing subdivision potential (STCA) perfect for first home buyers, investors and developers alike, take advantage of this fantastic opportunity. Comprising a generous lounge, Reverse cycle central heating and cooling throughout, the property then offers 3 sizeable bedrooms, a neat central bathroom, laundry and a kitchen complete with gas cooking & Oven. Double garage and side access, all located within 5 minutes from major Corio Central shopping centre, 2 minutes from the Geelong Homemaker Centre, 45 minutes from Melbourne CBD and 15 minutes from Geelong CBD. What more could you want? A large home on a large block situated halfway between Melbourne CBD and the Surf Coast!
-3 great sized bedrooms, all with built in robes.
-Large lounge & separate dining area.
-Reverse Cycle Central Heating & Cooling.

Description:
When Style & Locations Come Together
Living the fine life in this distinguished family home is more affordable than you would think, this is a property you will truly want to call your own. This gorgeous family home is set right in the heart of Corio, boasting a beautiful sense of style and comfort like no other.
Featuring large light filled spaces, quality timber floors front to back and a flexible floor plan including three large bedrooms, centrally located family bathroom, a generous size laundry with ample storage and bench space and a separate toilet adjacent.
A wall style kitchen includes modern finishes, stone bench-tops, tiled splash-back, electric cooktop and ample cupboard space while adjacent is the dining area and a very spacious living room that overlooks the streetscape.
Quality fixtures and fittings throughout this home compliment the sophistication and modern lifestyle, combined with indoor/outdoor entertaining perfect for all seasons.
Other features include ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ample secure off-street parking, sauna, additional shower room, workshop and a back yard for growing little football stars!
All comprised on a large sun soaked 525m2 (approx.) allotment accompanied by low-maintenance gardens offering you heaps of privacy. Set in one of Corios most established streets with a potential rental return of $315-$325pw, this home boasts easy access to the primary & secondary schools, Corio Shopping Village, easy access to the surf coast and the Geelong Ring Road Simply move in and enjoy!
Insights: 90 Vermont Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Investment with a 5 Star Lease Agreement On A Corner Allotment with Two Street Frontages !!
This exciting investment opportunity is situated in one of Geelong's top performing suburbs renowned for generous capital growth and is perfectly located within walking distance to Corio Shopping Village, quality schools, local transport and just moments away from Geelong's ring road. Underpinning this rare find is a reliable rent return of $250 per week, allowing the new owners to simply set and forget any issues associated with acquiring quality tenants in times of uncertainty.
• North Facing Family Room with Floor Heater & Wall Mounted Aircon
• 2 Generous Bedrooms with Freestanding Cupboards
• Spacious Kitchen with Zoned Meals Area & Gas Cooking
• 466m² (approximately) Corner Allotment with two Street Frontages
• Fully Fenced and Secure with Additional Bungalow
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
